docs.text: Welcome to Piggy WIKI Nice to meet u For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . What I am learning now? Bioinfomatics Biology Molecular Biology Gene drive Hi friend, this is mkdocs, a good tool to use markdown mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
